long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bhatakne Nehi Dunga - Social Media and Distracting Website Blocker

Stay focused and increase your productivity with "Bhatakne Nehi Dunga", a powerful Chrome extension designed to block distracting websites like social media and keep you on track. Say goodbye to time-wasting websites.

Features:

Block Major Social Media Sites: Prevent access to popular social media platforms that disrupt your productivity.
Custom URL Blocking: Add or remove any website from your personal block list, giving you full control over what is blocked.
Friendly Reminder Page: Displays a customized page with a motivational image and message whenever a blocked site is accessed.
Easy to Install and Use: Simple to set up and manage through Chrome's extension settings.

New Feature: Add and Remove Custom URLs

Not only does this extension block popular social media sites, but it also gives you the flexibility to block any other websites of your choice! Simply add or remove URLs to customize your own block list, ensuring you stay focused on what truly matters.

Check out the source code for our extension on GitHub at https://github.com/nsubhadipta/social-media-blocker

Use this extension to stay on track, avoid distractions, and achieve your goals. If you find it helpful, please rate us on the Chrome Web Store and share your feedback!
